title: 20% Off at American Airlines
description:
Get 20% off your next flight with American Airlines and save on your upcoming travel adventures. Redeem code at checkout to shop and save.


Discount: 20%
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: Hand-Picked 10% Off for Veterans at American Airlines
description: Veterans qualify for a 10% discount with a special American Airlines promo code. Verify your status in order to earn discount.

title: 10% Off Flight Tickets for Active Military Members & Families at American Airlines
description:
Save 10% on flight tickets with American Airlines for active military members and their families. Plan your next travel adventure with this exclusive offer!


Discount: 10%
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: Extra 10% Off Flights to NYC
description:
Veterans earn 10% off American Airlines promo code after verification on website. Redeem code at checkout for 10% off. 


Discount: 10%
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 40% Off 1 Night Reservations
description: Experience the ultimate family vacation at Great Wolf Lodge with 40% off one night reservations. Plan your next unforgettable vacation today.

title: Up to 40% Discount on Single Night Stay
$25 Off Flights to LaGuardia in December
description:
Valid for veterans with a valid military ID. Verify military status in order to earn American Airlines promo code.


Discount: $25
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 1500 Bonus Miles for AAdvantage Dining Members
description:
Earn 1500 welcome miles as an AAdvantage Dining member. Within 30 days, you must spend $150 or more with your linked credit card at a participating restaurant to earn miles.


Discount: 1500
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 25% Off In-Flight Food & Beverage
description:
Valid on select food and beverage items only. Earn as a Citi/AAdvantage credit card member. See card page for details.


Discount: 25%
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: Up to 35% Off Avis & Budget Rental Cars
description:
Join the AAdvantage Program and open up a credit card to earn tons of benefits, including up to 35% off select rental cars.


Discount: 35%
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: $100 Off Virgin Voyages at American Airlines
description:
Discount: $100
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 1000 Bonus Miles on Next Stay at IHG Hotel
description:
Must be an AAdvantage Member to earn. Book and stay two more more nights at an IHG hotel before November 15 to earn miles.


Discount: 1000
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 25,000 Bonus Miles with Sandals Resort Booking
description:
Book a vacation package at Sandals & Beaches Resorts to earn 25,000 bonus miles as an AA member. Discount applied at checkout. Book by September 30 to earn.


Discount: 25,000
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 25 Bonus Miles per Dollar Donated to Stand Up to Cancer
description:
Earn 25 bonus American Airlines AAdvantage miles for each dollar you donate to Stand Up to Cancer for a limited time.


Discount: 25 BONUS
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers

title: 20,000 Bonus Miles with Zoëtry Wellness & Resorts Spas Vacation Package
description:
Earn 20,000 bonus miles with American Airlines promo code after booking a vacation package with Zoëtry Wellness.


Discount: 20,000
Customer Requirements: New and Existing Customers
